CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole mobilities of the polymers or the polymer : PC 70 BM blends were measured via the space charge limited current ( SCLC ) method using hole - only devices ( ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer or polymer : PC 70 BM / Au ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PC 70 BM |
| PEDOT |
| PSS |
| ITO |
| Au |

Note:

* PC 70 BM is a type of polymer.
* PEDOT and PSS are materials used in the production of the hole-only devices.
* ITO and Au are materials used in the production of the electrodes.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PC 70 BM |
| PEDOT |
| PSS |

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Material Name" and were removed from the table:

* "ITO" (mentioned as a material used in the production of electrodes)
* "Au" (mentioned as a material used in the production of electrodes)
* "SCLC" (mentioned as a method for measuring hole mobilities, not a material name)
